articles.description: Scotland's fans have partied all week in Munich. Now the hangover has kicked in after Germany humbling, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Scotland's party over. Now hangover begins for Steve Clarke

articles.description: Spanish football expert and BBC Sport columnist Guillem Balague looks at Spain's chances in Euro 2024.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Spain's 'band of brothers' are a serious candidate says Guillem Balague

articles.description: Bryson DeChambeau cards a one-under 69 to set the clubhouse lead, one ahead of Rory McIlroy, midway through round two at Pinehurst, North Carolina.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Bryson DeChambeau sets round two target, Rory McIlroy one back

articles.description: South Africa beat Nepal by one run in last-ball thriller, while New Zealand bowl Uganda out for 40 to claim first win at T20 World Cup.
articles.title: T20 World Cup results: South Africa survive Nepal scare, New Zealand thrash Uganda

articles.description: Germany make an ideal start to their European Championship bid as a 5-1 demolition of Scotland in the Euro 2024 opener gets fans dreaming.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Germany expectations rise after Scotland rout in opener

articles.description: What do Scotland do next to keep their hopes of reaching the Euro 2024 knockout stages alive after being humbled by Germany in their opener.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Where do Scotland go now after nightmare start?

articles.description: Record-breaking Tour de France cyclist Mark Cavendish has been given a knighthood in the King's Birthday Honour's list.
articles.title: King's Birthday Honours: Mark Cavendish given knighthood

articles.description: The Friedkin Group agrees a deal in principle to complete a takeover of Everton, BBC Sport understands.
articles.title: Everton: Friedkin Group agrees deal for takeover of Premier League club
England & Scotland Euros XI: Micah and Shearer's combined picks

articles.description: Co-hosts USA reach the Super 8s stage of the T20 World Cup after a washout against Ireland in Florida.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: USA reach Super 8s after washout against Ireland in Flordia
